container.artificial-construct.title: Internal Compartment
container.beaver.title: Mouth Storage
container.blob.title: Inside You
container.felvaxian.title: Scavenger Pouch
container.ninetails.title: Pocket

origin.origins-plus-plus.alien_axolotl.d: You are an alien that prays to the Golden Space Gods and has crash-landed onto this planet.
origin.origins-plus-plus.anomaly.descrip: Once an ancient star, now unstable energy.
origin.origins-plus-plus.anomaly.name: Anomaly
origin.origins-plus-plus.artificial_cons: Constructs are a combination of simple redstone components and complicated machinery to make a functional living being.
origin.origins-plus-plus.automaton.descr: These machines were built by a race long lost to time. Some were kept in a capsule that eroded quite recently. They now wander this earth without the fear of death.
origin.origins-plus-plus.automaton.name: Automaton
origin.origins-plus-plus.beaver.descript: Beavers are large, semi-aquatic rodents in the genus 'castor' native to the temperate northern hemisphere.
origin.origins-plus-plus.beaver.name: Beaver
origin.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.name: Bedrockean
origin.origins-plus-plus.binturong.descr: A binturong is a bear cat of the trees.
origin.origins-plus-plus.binturong.name: Binturong
origin.origins-plus-plus.bird.descriptio: Birds are small and very cute. They can also fly and chirp.
origin.origins-plus-plus.bird.name: Bird
origin.origins-plus-plus.blazian.descrip: A better version of the Blazeborn origin!
origin.origins-plus-plus.blazian.name: Blazian
origin.origins-plus-plus.blob.descriptio: You are some kind of blob, you don't know anything about yourself but you seem to know already about the world around you.
origin.origins-plus-plus.blob.name: Blob
origin.origins-plus-plus.boarling.descri: This tough-skinned race relies on their strength alone to get by in life.
origin.origins-plus-plus.boarling.name: Boarling
origin.origins-plus-plus.broodmother.des: The mother of the arachnid colonies, the broodmother is an elder being capable of great destruction. Often feared by those who utter the name.
origin.origins-plus-plus.calamitous_rogu: You lurk in the shadows, waiting for just the right moment to strike. Luckily for you, unlike the average rogue you've learned different weapon disciplines for ambushes.
origin.origins-plus-plus.candyperson.des: A sugar-like entity that has a serious problem with sweet food!
origin.origins-plus-plus.child_of_cthulh: You are a descendant of Cthulhu.
origin.origins-plus-plus.chimaera.descri: Dark Inquisitors made with eldritch and draconic magic in order to hunt demons and the undead. You are what we in the biz call 'chaotic good' However, beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster...
origin.origins-plus-plus.chimaera.name: Chimaera
origin.origins-plus-plus.cobra.descripti: You are a small cobra, your fangs are full of poison and you are ready to attack when you need to.
origin.origins-plus-plus.cobra.name: Cobra
origin.origins-plus-plus.copper_golem.de: Comprised entirely of copper, 'tis a sturdy machine.
origin.origins-plus-plus.corrupted_withe: You were experimented on by scientists and were exposed to dragons breath. You killed the scientists, but not before the experiment was complete...
origin.origins-plus-plus.craftsman.descr: You are the heir of a long lineage of craftsmen and knights, so you are proficient in arts and crafts.
origin.origins-plus-plus.craftsman.name: Craftsman
origin.origins-plus-plus.dark_mage.descr: A practitioner of dark magic, you are an evil being that hates happiness and all living beings.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dark_mage.name: Dark Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn.desc: You are a necromancer with control over everything belonging in the afterlife.
origin.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn.name: Deathsworn
origin.origins-plus-plus.demi_god.descri: After training for years on end you have overworked yourself to the point of being unstoppable, the only beings that would be able to beat you are the bosses themselves.
origin.origins-plus-plus.demi_god.name: Demi-God
origin.origins-plus-plus.deranged.descri: You are an ordinary human, but you come from a rotten and horrible family that hurt you when you were young. You came to think that this was the norm, and then you became mentally unsound.
origin.origins-plus-plus.deranged.name: Deranged
origin.origins-plus-plus.devine_architec: Long ago before the formation of the Minecraft universe there were groups of architects the construct each element of the universe. They all worked together to construct all the blocks and biomes of the universe, but eventually they all went extinct once their jobs had finished. All except for you...
origin.origins-plus-plus.dolphin.descrip: Dolphins are aquatic creatures that likes to jump out of the water, and are most likely found in the ocean.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dolphin.name: Dolphin
origin.origins-plus-plus.drakonwither.de: The child of the wither and the dragon. You are an unnatural anomaly full of powers unknown to man. Alive for hundreds of years and once worshiped by many.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dullahan.descri: You are an ancient horsemen, harbinger of death and slavery using your binding chains and horse to kill your victims.
origin.origins-plus-plus.dullahan.name: Dullahan
origin.origins-plus-plus.earth_spirit.de: A spiritual being that rises from the depths of earth taking the stones and soil to make it's physical body.
origin.origins-plus-plus.earth_spirit_tw: The spiritual form of the earth spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ebon_wing.descr: Ebon-Wings are winged creatures often seen hunting for prey by themselves or with Blood-Horns.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ebon_wing.name: Ebon-Wing
origin.origins-plus-plus.emblazing_warri: You are one of the nether entities sent to the overworld to cause chaos and disruption. Your powers are tied to your injuries.
origin.origins-plus-plus.end_mage.descri: An ancient mage who studied the creatures of the end and tried to become one.
origin.origins-plus-plus.end_mage.name: End Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.enigma.descript: Mystery... puzzles... trickery... You make people live in fear of themselves and question their own sanity.
origin.origins-plus-plus.enigma.name: Enigma
origin.origins-plus-plus.fallen_angel.de: After spending an eternity in hell, you finally escaped and are craving some revenge.
origin.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian.descr: A feline raven that can soar and pounce. A carnivorous hunter and high flyer
origin.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian.name: Felvaxian
origin.origins-plus-plus.flea.name: Flea
origin.origins-plus-plus.frog.descriptio: Your frog character has certain traits deriving from your frog ancestry.
origin.origins-plus-plus.frog.name: Frog
origin.origins-plus-plus.gaia.descriptio: You are the mother of all nature, a goddess of earth with a passion for the flowers you've created.
origin.origins-plus-plus.gaia.name: Gaia
origin.origins-plus-plus.ghast.descripti: Ghosts of players who died in the nether, the only thing these spirits can remember is that they were trying to find a way back home.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ghast.name: Ghast
origin.origins-plus-plus.giant.descripti: The giants are an ancient race, becoming quite a rare sight in modern times. Their history remains unknown with few left to keep it alive.
origin.origins-plus-plus.giant.name: Giant
origin.origins-plus-plus.glacier.descrip: A mystical creature born out of snow and ice. You were created out of the cold and have lived long enough to know that the cold can kill all.
origin.origins-plus-plus.glacier.name: Glacier
origin.origins-plus-plus.gnoll.descripti: You are a strong, large, carrion eater with a temper!
origin.origins-plus-plus.gnoll.name: Gnoll
origin.origins-plus-plus.golden_golem.de: A golem created by the illagers with gold and totems of undying.
origin.origins-plus-plus.goolien.descrip: A gooey alien species that is often confused with their terrestrial slimy cousins.
origin.origins-plus-plus.goolien.name: Goolien
origin.origins-plus-plus.hellforged.desc: A being, created and forged within the darkest depths of hell. It thrives off of the heat and will freeze rapidly if not hot enough.
origin.origins-plus-plus.hellforged.name: Hellforged
origin.origins-plus-plus.hero_of_the_wil: Your character has many abilities that will help with exploration.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_king.descri: Born in the frozen north, and a descendant of the ice queen, the ice king has grown accustomed to the cold
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_king.name: Ice King
origin.origins-plus-plus.ice_porcupine.d: Once a natural creature, you were corrupted by demonic energies, giving you command over ice.
origin.origins-plus-plus.iceling.descrip: An evolved form of the inchling, adapted to the cold.
origin.origins-plus-plus.iceling.name: Iceling
origin.origins-plus-plus.ignisian.descri: Archdemons exiled after the rebellion. Weakened by the retribution, the betrayed Ignisians were driven to the shadows. Day by day, their power grows, and soon, vengeance will be theirs.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ignisian.name: Ignisian
origin.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/illu: After mastering the art of the bow, you have become an Illusioner Apprentice have now unlocked new powers. (Evolve with 'The End?')
You have unlocked your true potential ands evolved into a Master Illusioner.
You have mastered the art of illusion and have unlocked your true potential
You were made but never used so now it's time to take revenge! (Evolve with 'We Need to Go Deeper')
You have mastered the bow and have evolved into an Illusioner Apprentice.
origin.origins-plus-plus.insect.descript: The people who have evolved to live with the insects.
origin.origins-plus-plus.insect.name: Insect
origin.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish.descr: Jellyfish are creatures which use their stings to paralyze and poison their prey.
origin.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
origin.origins-plus-plus.kelperet.descri: When a Heart of the Sea falls into the ocean, it can get tangled up into kelp, forming a small living being called a Kelperet.
origin.origins-plus-plus.kelperet.name: Kelperet
origin.origins-plus-plus.kirin.descripti: Like the feline and fox origins, but better.
origin.origins-plus-plus.kirin.name: Kirin
origin.origins-plus-plus.land_shark.desc: A shark that can survive both in water and on land.
origin.origins-plus-plus.land_shark.name: Land Shark
origin.origins-plus-plus.lepus.descripti: An evolutionary branch of common rabbits, the Lepus love to explore and scavenge lost ruins for loot.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lepus.name: Lepus
origin.origins-plus-plus.light_mage.desc: A practitioner of healing magic, the light mage is invaluable when it comes to restoring HP or protecting your allies. However, they lack physical strength.
origin.origins-plus-plus.light_mage.name: Light Mage
You was once a strong warrior for the draconian race that lived in the end, however during a war in the overworld you were killed. Many years later you awaken to find your dead yet still alive in the form of a lost draconian spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.desc: You are a powerful, undead being.
origin.origins-plus-plus.lunar_path.name: Lunar Path
origin.origins-plus-plus.magmean.descrip: Oozy, fiery, bouncy, what's not to love?
origin.origins-plus-plus.magmean.name: Magmean
origin.origins-plus-plus.malfunction.des: A bug in the system has given you stupidly useful trolling powers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.manipulator.des: These folks specialize in magic that utilize all types of various elements, some of which you can find from the creatures and environment around you, while others you create yourself.
origin.origins-plus-plus.moth.name: Moth
origin.origins-plus-plus.mothling.descri: A mothling is a winged moth-like creature that originally evolved in taiga biomes before adapting and spreading to the rest of the overworld.
origin.origins-plus-plus.mothling.name: Mothling
origin.origins-plus-plus.mountain_goat.d: Protective of their homes, they often ram unfamiliar people off cliffs where they live.
origin.origins-plus-plus.mouse.name: Mouse
origin.origins-plus-plus.ninetails.descr: Legend has it that Ninetails came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ninetails.name: Ninetails
origin.origins-plus-plus.panoptican.desc: Strange airborne entities that observe, hoard, and do not interfere.
origin.origins-plus-plus.panoptican.name: Panoptican
origin.origins-plus-plus.part_robot.name: Part-Robot
origin.origins-plus-plus.pixie.descripti: You are a mischievous elf-like spirit.
origin.origins-plus-plus.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.origins-plus-plus.ram.name: Ram
origin.origins-plus-plus.raptus.descript: These dinosaur-like creatures are descendants of velociraptors. Nowadays, they can be found hunting in packs or resting.
origin.origins-plus-plus.raptus.name: Raptus
origin.origins-plus-plus.rat.description: You are a small critter of the night. You hunt and are filthy to others.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rat.name: Rat
origin.origins-plus-plus.ravager.descrip: You are an illager experiment, something between their normal kind and the massive illager beasts known as ravagers.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ravager.name: Ravager
origin.origins-plus-plus.red_panda.descr: The cutest origin there is! You 'prowl' the jungle as the most adorable predator.
origin.origins-plus-plus.red_panda.name: Red Panda
origin.origins-plus-plus.reign_farmer.de: You have been farming for decades, to the point that you've mastered every aspect of it.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rift_mage.descr: Rift Mages are known as 'The Immortals' in legends. Their control over space and time reigns supreme, able to defy even the Grim Reaper himself.
origin.origins-plus-plus.rift_mage.name: Rift Mage
origin.origins-plus-plus.ryu.description: You are a legendary creature born from the heavens.
origin.origins-plus-plus.ryu.name: Ryū
origin.origins-plus-plus.sand_walker.des: The sand walker is a creature of the desert and sand, forever walking amongst the dunes.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shadow.descript: You are one with the shadows.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shadow.name: Shadow
You were once human until you were trapped in an empty, void-like dimension eventually adapting to it over hundreds of years.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shifter.descrip: You were just a normal human but you stole the powers from the original 9 origins. Now you can switch between weaker forms of the original 9.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shifter.name: Shifter
origin.origins-plus-plus.shroomling.desc: After killing the ender dragon, you've grown to your final form: a small mushroom. Your spore count has increased dramatically, making all spore-related abilities stronger.
origin.origins-plus-plus.shroomling.name: Shroomling
origin.origins-plus-plus.snake.name: Snake
origin.origins-plus-plus.soul_seer.descr: You are a mostly soul-like being, though you have many skills and flaws relying on a soul-well to stay in top shape.
origin.origins-plus-plus.soul_seer.name: Soul-Seer
origin.origins-plus-plus.spectre.descrip: Archangels corrupted by the devil during the war. The curse stripped off their wings and made them ravenous for flesh. They now roam aimlessly, hoping to regain their former glory.
origin.origins-plus-plus.spectre.name: Spectre
origin.origins-plus-plus.spirit_ram.desc: A ram that has revisited Earth as a spirit to help people on their journey.
origin.origins-plus-plus.spirit_ram.name: Spirit Ram
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.descr: A tiny floaty mushroom-person that came out of the ground and started doing stuff. (Evolve with 'Free the End')
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.name: Sporeling
origin.origins-plus-plus.sporeling.upgra: After killing the ender dragon, you've grown into your final form: A small mushroom!
origin.origins-plus-plus.sprinter.name: Sprinter
origin.origins-plus-plus.stargazer.name: Stargazer
origin.origins-plus-plus.sunken_sailor.d: Legend has it that sunken sailors were cruel pirates that died in terrible shipwrecks, but now they're just hollow souls left to wonder a world they no longer fit into.
origin.origins-plus-plus.technomancer.de: You are a powerful technomancer. Armed with the power and knowledge of the godfathers of technomancy, you are able to create spells using conduits and your staff.
origin.origins-plus-plus.thornling.descr: You're a small arcane creature, protected by a strange magical spell. You don't know where you came from, you just know you exist.
origin.origins-plus-plus.thornling.name: Thornling
origin.origins-plus-plus.triangulon.desc: You are an infinite shape. That is all.
origin.origins-plus-plus.triangulon.name: Triangulon
origin.origins-plus-plus.vishaichian.des: An ancient warrior of great skill in combat.
origin.origins-plus-plus.void_samurai.de: A human trapped in the void for what felt like an eternity, who has finally returned, but only partially
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/suprem: You have slain The Beast, and have grown stronger, learning to shape the void.
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidbo: You are a descendant of the void. You have received the gift of flight, and the ability to escape the void. But don't stray too far from home. (Evolve with 'Free the End')
origin.origins-plus-plus.voidling/voidli: A creature of the Void, born from the abyss and brought into the physical realm. (Evolve with 'Caves & Cliffs')
origin.origins-plus-plus.volcanic_dragon: You are a dragon born out of volcanic energy.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wailing_one.des: A harbinger of death, villagers fear them, pillagers respect them, Wailing Ones are banshees whose presence and eerie cries always bring death, and are a reminder that all things must eventually end.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wanderer.descri: The sense of adventure and the excitement of new things guide you. You became a wanderer, learning many useful skills on the way.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wanderer.name: Wanderer
origin.origins-plus-plus.wandering_spiri: You are a spirit, lost in the overworld for reasons unknown to you. Your thoughts and memories, the only thing that linger from your past life.
origin.origins-plus-plus.war_god.descrip: Inspired by the war god in Passerine.
origin.origins-plus-plus.war_god.name: War God
origin.origins-plus-plus.warden.descript: Your warden character has certain traits deriving from your ancestry.
origin.origins-plus-plus.warden.name: Warden
origin.origins-plus-plus.warforged.descr: Warforged are made from wood and metal, but they can feel pain and emotion. Built as weapons, they must now find a purpose beyond war.
origin.origins-plus-plus.warforged.name: Warforged
origin.origins-plus-plus.warper.name: Warper
origin.origins-plus-plus.witch_of_ink.de: You saw 'The Canvas': a legendary artifact that has enlightened you. Your only purpose is to create a world made entirely of paint and simple colors.
origin.origins-plus-plus.withered_fox.de: These strange creatures have been around for centuries and are facing extinctions by hunters for their hide.
origin.origins-plus-plus.withered_skelet: You are a wither skeleton, your body is strong and your bones rattle like those of your siblings in the nether.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wizard.descript: You used to be a normal villager but you grew wise and old and decided to use your magic for good.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wizard.name: Wizard
origin.origins-plus-plus.wyverian.descri: A descendant from the powerful dragon called the wyvern.
origin.origins-plus-plus.wyverian.name: Wyverian
origin.origins-plus-plus.zero_aizawa.des: An aizawa is a powerful being, able to travel long distances and loved by everyone.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.brute.des: Summon a Piglin Brute in the overworld. Submit! will now deal even more damage.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.kill.desc: Let your minion score a kill.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.kill.name: Getting Stronger Every Day...
origins-plus-plus.advancements.petri.des: Obtain your first petrified heart from a hostile mob.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.root.name: An Eulogy for the Dead
Summon a skeleton. Submit! will now deal more damage.
origins-plus-plus.advancements.summon.de: Summon a mob to serve you!
origins-plus-plus.advancements.wither_sk: Summon a wither skeleton in the overworld.
origins-plus-plus.anomaly.sleep_fail: Time isn't relative to you preventing your ability to sleep!
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.coal: Your senses discovered a piece of coal.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.gold: Your senses discovered a chunk of gold.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.iron: Your senses discovered a chunk of iron.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.lapis: Your senses discovered some lapis lazuli.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.redstone: Your senses discovered some redstone dust.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.sleep_fail: You feel rested enough from your time as a part of the world.
origins-plus-plus.bedrockean.totem_of_un: Your senses discovered some sort of dusty miniature statue.

§fA dusty miniature statue made of §6gold §fwith §2emerald eyes§f.
Something tells you this should stay with you...§r
origins-plus-plus.book.mana_potions:
§nMana Potions:§r
You can drink mana potions to refill your mana. There are 2 types: the basic mana potion and the super mana potion.

§lBasic Potion:§r Honey Bottle in your offhand. §o(100 mana)§r
§lSuper Potion:§r Dragon Breath in your offhand. §o(250 mana)§r
origins-plus-plus.brokenKeybindsMessage: Warning! Keybinds are broken in this version of Origins (Forge). Please upgrade to Minecraft 1.19.2 and Origins (Forge) 1.5.0.6.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.absorpt:
§nAbsorption:§r
You can use this spell to temporarily get absorption and resistance!

Item: Golden Apple in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.darknes:
§nDarkness:§r
You can use this spell do give blindness and slowness to all nearby entities!

Item: Ink Sac in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.decay:
§nDecay:§r
You can give wither and slowness to everything nearby.

Item: Wither Rose in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.explosi:
§nExplosion:§r
You can summon a explosive salmon wherever you look.

Item: Gunpowder in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.lava_sp:
§nLava Sponge:§r
You can use this spell to absorb any lava around you.

Item: Magma Block in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.leviosa:
§nLeviosa:§r
You can use this spell to levitate everything nearby.

Item: Phantom Membrane in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.phase:
§nPhase:§r
You can phase through blocks with that spell. (Passive, drains mana over time).

Item: Glistering Melon Slice in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.repulsi:
§nRepulsion:§r
You can deal extra knockback.

Item: Slime ball in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.scorch:
§nScorch:§r
You can use this spell to burn your enemies.

Item: Blaze Powder in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.shatter:
§nShatter:§r
You can use this spell to break blocks around you, (not near unbreakable blocks).

Item: Netherite Pickaxe in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.strong_:
§nStrong Wolf:§r
You can summon a strong wolf. (You need to tame it, but it will not attack you)

Item: Bone Block in your offhand
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.welcome:
Welcome to the Dark Mage Origin!

There are some hidden spells, but they require specific items in your offhand to be cast. §o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r

You can also make mana potions to store extra mana.
origins-plus-plus.dark-mage.book.zoglins:
§nZoglins:§r
You can summon a few war zoglins. (They will hit you back if you attack them)

Item: Leather in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.deranged.sleep_fail: You feel a horrible sense of dread so you decide not to sleep.
origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing.sleep_fail: You feel uncomfortable and are unable to sleep. Maybe try sleeping below Y = -20?
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.hidden_c:
§nHidden Crafts:§r

§lEnd Stone:§r
7 Cobblestone + 1 Sand + 1 Ender Pearl = 8 End Stone. (Shapeless)

§lChorus Flower:§r
7 Oak Saplings + 1 Purple Dye + 1 Ender Pearl = 7 Chorus Flowers. (Shapeless)
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.infinite:
§nInfinite Range:§r
If you hold a ender pearl on your offhand you will be able to interact with blocks far away. (Passive, drains mana over time)
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.waypoint:
§nWaypoint:§r
Use [Primary + Shift] with a Nether Star in your offhand to mark a location, and [Primary] with a Nether Star in your offhand to teleport back to it!
origins-plus-plus.end-mage.book.welcome:
Welcome to the End Mage Origin!

There are some secrets, and you can also make mana potions to store extra mana.

§o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r.
origins-plus-plus.enigma.message: Don't speak to me or my son ever again!
origins-plus-plus.glacier.sleep_fail: It isn't cold enough for you to sleep
origins-plus-plus.kelperet.sleep_fail: You are too far from water to be able to sleep.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.accele:
§nAccelerate:§r
Apply Speed and Haste to all entities within a 6 block radius.

Item: Clock in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.army:
§nArmy:§r
You can summon several snow golems.

Item: Carved Pumpkin in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.blessi:
§nBlessing of the Sea:§r
Apply Water Breathing to all players within a 6 block radius.

Item: Heart of the Sea in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.bolt:
§nBolt:§r
You can summon lightning wherever you want. (Though you need to be exposed to the sky).

Item: Nether Star in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.devour:
§nDevour:§r
You can summon evoker fangs! Be careful because they can damage you too!

Item: Totem of Undying in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.experi:
§nExperience:§r
You can exchange quartz for experience.

Item: Quartz in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.exting:
§nExtinguish:§r
You can give fire resistance to you and anyone in a 6 blocks radius.

Item: Magma Cream in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.fireba:
§nFireball:§r
You can summon a motionless fireball.

Item: Blaze Rod in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.firewo:
§nFirework Magic:§r
You can summon a firework explosion wherever you want.

Item: Firework Star in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.fluctu:
§nFluctuate:§r
You can use this spell to send all entities within 6 blocks (including yourself) into the sky. You will also receive Slow Falling.

Item: Feather in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.illumi:
§nIllumine:§r
Apply Glowing to all entities in a 50 block radius and Night Vision to those in an 8 block radius.

Item: Glowstone Dust in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.lava_v:
§nLava Vision:§r
Be able to see better in lava. (Passive)

Item: Magma Cream in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.leap:
§nLeap:§r
You can use this spell to leap in the air.

Item: Rabbit Foot in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.pocket:
§nPocket Dimension:§r
This spell will replace all the basic spells.

Item: Lodestone in your offhand.

Use [Load Toolbar Activator] to create and reset your pocket dimension. §lIf you reset it, everything will be destroyed!§r

§nKeys:§r
Use [Primary] to go, and [Secondary] to leave. Add [Shift] to take/bring back an entity within 3 block with you.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.poison:
§nPoison Garden:§r
You can summon a poison garden that will trap your enemies wherever you want.

Item: Flowering Azalea in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.repuls:
§nRepulsion:§r
Anyone who attacks you will be pushed away. (Passive)

Item: End Crystal in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.shield:
§nShield Sentinel:§r
You can summon two sentries to protect you, they will attack anything that moves.

Item: Shield in your offhand.
origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.welcom:
Welcome to the Light Mage Origin!

There are some hidden spells, but they require specific items in your offhand to be cast. §o(Cast spells with [Primary] + [Shift])§r

You can also make mana potions to store extra mana.
Blessed with the protection of the Ender Dragon
origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian.sword.l: A blade personalised for the strength of a warrior
origins-plus-plus.mouse.lore: §fI have always been a wooden hoe... §4What are you talking about?§r
origins-plus-plus.mouse.name: Yoinked!
origins-plus-plus.rift-mage.message: You are venturing too far from your rift!
origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram.sleep_fail: You have to sleep above Y = 70.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.black_con: Launch a hook to move around.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.blue_cond: Generates a healing aura capable of healing yourself and others.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.light_blu: Summon nanites to you which protects yourself from all attacks.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.lime_cond: Summon a metal cage to trap mobs or players in front of you.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.red_condu: Shoots lasers from your staff and destroys everything in its path.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.staff.lor: A powerful staff used as a medium to create spells with conduits...
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/a_: Touching kelp gives you Regeneration, Blindness and Slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ex: You are naturally three blocks tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/fi: Fire brings back bad memories, so you take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/go: Being close to a gold block or soul sand gives you great speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/lo: You float for a while whenever you're low on health (with no slow falling).
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ne: You are weaker and slower in the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/pa: Dealing damage to wolves gives you the strength potion effect for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/po: Applies the poison effect on your opponent for a short period of time after hitting them.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/tr: You take increased damage from weapons enchanted with Bane Of Arthropods.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/eternity: Time for you to learn what it takes to exist yet not exist simultaneously... (Prevents sleep)
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/moons_gr: You belong in the night time! Take a leap, grab a sword and use that moonlight to your advantage!
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/scorchin: The starlight in you greatly weakens you during the day, be careful until nightfall.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/supernov: Your body is made of pure energy, so you are slightly transparent and you don't seem to have bones?.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/time_spa: Anomalies are highly unstable, but you can use this to your advantage; you can teleport where you want to go.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/unstable: Due to your unstable state, your body will periodically fade away causing hunger.
power.origins-plus-plus.artificial-const: You are a battery powered machine. This battery slowly runs our over time. As the battery decreases, you will start to move slower until you cannot move at all. You can refill this battery by placing coal, charcoal, or redstone in your offhand.
You can shoot arrows from your offhand.
Since you are a machine, you cannot heal naturally, but you can heal your self with iron nuggets (small increase) or iron/copper ingots (medium increase) in your offhand.
Due to a lot of your insides being made of slime and honey, you take slightly less fall damage.
Your outer shell is made of metal, so you have some armor and a gray-ish tint.
You are unable to eat, but your hunger will never reach zero. You are also immune to poison.
Due to having pistons in your arms you have extended reach.
You can store items in a chest-like compartment. These items do not drop on death.
You're much denser than water making you sink.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/fireba: You have both a fire bar and water bar. Make sure to watch these carefully!. Refill you fire bar by holding coal/charcoal/coal block/lava bucket and [Shift + Right-Click]. Refill your water bar by drinking water bottles or by holding a water bucket and [Shift + Right-Click].
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/power_: When you run out on any bar you'll enter power saving mode.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/toggle: You can switch between fire and water attacks
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/undyin: You do not die, but you will power down when too low on steam. (*You will die after a minute of being powered down)
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/unnatu: You don't need to eat. You can't regen naturally either.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/water_: Be warned! This uses a lot of steam!
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/aquatic.d: You have Dolphin's Grace when underwater.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.desc: You gain Mining Fatigue when you have more than a stack of any log in your inventory.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.name: Lazy
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/logger.de: You gain haste when near logs and stripped logs.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.desc: You get Speed and Regeneration for a short time.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.name: Beaver Rage
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/razor_tee: You deal extra damage due to your sharp teeth
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/storage.d: You can store precious items in your mouth that do not drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bedro: You are so dense and heavy that when you fall greater than four blocks, you break the block you fall on (except for some strong blocks).
Since you are stronger than most you can break bedrock with a netherite pickaxe.
You are nearly unbreakable because of your bedrock ancestors so you are immune to drowning, and starvation. You also are a darker tint due to being bedrock.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bow.d: Due to your short arms you can't pull back a bow or crossbow.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bulky: You are bulky so you sink underwater and gain slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/dense: Due to your density you have extra health, and you are slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/dis.d: You never have eaten so you never have a full food bar
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/fast_: You were built to mine so you mine faster.
You heal differently than most, so you have a constant heal, but half a heart each second and a half.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/heavy: Due to your great weight you can barely jump a block high.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/immob: Like your ancestors, you can be immune to all damage - however, when you do this it costs your speed, strength, and it takes much longer to heal.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/knowi: Your familiarity with the earth allows to to find treasures others cannot.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/lava_: Since you are most of the time covered in lava you have adjusted to see in it.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/no_el: Due to your great density you could not ever fly.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/potio: Your skin is too hard for potions to get through and effect you
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/power: Due to your great strength you can launch mobs into the air when you hit them.
You are a block tall because you used to be a block.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sleep: You got plenty of rest while you sat at the bottom of the world, why would you need any more?
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/spawn: You spawn in the nether where there is twice as much bedrock.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/stron: Due to you being made out of bedrock, you deal extra damage when using your fist.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sun_w: The sun is too bright for your cave adapted eyes.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/blast_: Binturongs are weak to explosion damage
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/camouf: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can camouflage into your surroundings to become invisible, but use hunger doing so
Binturongs deal extra damage with their sharp claws
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/flamma: Binturongs hide is very flammable, so it causes them extra damage
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jockey: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jump_b: Binturongs can jump higher than average
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/leap.d: Binturongs can leap from tree to tree with a powerful jump
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/less_b: Binturongs need to save energy for leaping so they can't hold their breath for long
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/manic_: Binturong's claws allow them break blocks faster than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/noctur: Binturongs are adapted to the night, so they have permanent night vision
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/small_: Being a quadruped, binturongs are smaller than average
Binturongs have a need for speed
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/sugar_: Binturongs can snort red dye for some reason
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/thick_: A binturong's thick hide means that they are immune to all types of thorns and spikes
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/too_he: Binturongs are too weak to wear netherite armour
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/almost_no_a: Birb is very tiny which makes it hard for it to wear any armor apart from leather, gold, chainmail, and iron chestplates.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/feather_gri: Due to your weak wings, you can't load bows or crossbows normally, which makes the amount of damage you do with arrows way less.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/granivore.d: As a birb, you prefer to eat seeds instead of other food, so you can only eat seeds.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/jockey.desc: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/jockey.name: Jockey
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/launch.desc: You can flap your wings to send you forward.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/launch.name: Flap
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/love_air.de: You love flying so much that you learned how to use it to your full potential, you deal twice the damage while flying, however you deal very little damage while on the ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/small.descr: Birbs are small, you are a birb so you are small too. Since you are a birb you also have natural wings!
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/small.name: Small Birb
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/smaller_app: As a small birb, you don't have to eat as much.
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/tweet.descr: [Save Toolbar Activator] Birbs love to repeat what other things near them say, and now with that ability, they can find where the sound is coming from to know where things are nearby!
power.origins-plus-plus.bird/tweet.name: Tweet
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/blazing_: Launch yourself into the air and gain slow falling until you hit the ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/charge_b: Throw a flurry of fire charges.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/cold_her: When in a cold environment your majorly slowed and Weakness II is applied.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/fortress: You spawn in a Nether Fortress.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/hot_hand: You can't use bows, crossbows, and tridents.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/no_place: When in the Nether you have Speed II, Strength, and no mobs will attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/overworl: You gain Weakness when you are in the Overworld.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/particle: Flame particles emit from your body.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/punch.de: Your body is made up of flames, so it can set enemies on fire just by your punches and you have flames around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/amethyst_ea: You can eat amethyst shards due to thinking they are a part of you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/blob_creatu: You are as tall as a husk, but you have fewer hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/colour.name: Pinkish
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/electrical_: Somehow, lightning goes right through you without dealing any damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/frozen_feet: When in cold biomes, you'll gain speed because your jelly-like skin freezes to become a lot more stable to walk with.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.descri: [Save Toolbar Activator] Increase your health bar by gaining temporary blindness + slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.name: Heal
Although you still use normal hearts, your health has been replaced by a health bar. Using abilities or getting hit causes the bar to go down a constant amount.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.descr: You can shoot out a part of yourself (This uses 20% of your health bar).
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.name: Own Self
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/melting_han: Your hands melt in hot biomes making you weaker.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/nether_weak: The nether is a new place for you, so your hands get a bit weaker from the stress that it gives you.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/no_lungs.de: Although you are weak in water, you still don't drown in it because you don't need to breathe.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/paranoia.de: You are so paranoid that when you are hit, you get a short speed boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/side_step.d: Double-tapping a movement key will dash in that direction.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/stacking_at: Your attack will give a stack, up to 3 times, at 3 stacks, Your next attack deal more damage and set to one stack, it will reset after some times not attacking.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/storage.des: You can store things inside yourself and they don't drop on death.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/strength.de: You are stronger when your health bar is more than half full.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/water_effec: When wet, you start transforming into some kind of puddle making you slower and hungrier.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.desc: You receive 175% more XP from all sources. [Right-Click] while holding a book to gain 20 experience points.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.name: Wisdom
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/delicio: The smell of bacon encourages your attackers to deal far more damage. Be careful around fire!
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/glutton: All food is far more saturating.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_sou: Being in Hog-Wild state will play audio queues every once in a while
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_wil: If at or below half health, you will enter a rage state, boosting both your speed and attack damage.
Your lack of fingers prevents you from using shields and projectile weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/overwei: Your unhealthy appetite has you move slower than usual.
Your base attack damage is much higher than average.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/tough.d: Your thick skin and weight reduces any received knockback or projectile damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/clim: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are fast and at will, you can climb blocks!
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/cobw: Attack a target in a cobweb, using your fist to feed yourself.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/curs: You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Bane Of Arthropods.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/exos: Like spiders, you are equipped with an exoskeleton – a hard, external covering that provides both structural support and protection from predators.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/extr: Because of your ancestry, you get extra hearts.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/long: Spiders can modify their speed and with their powerful legs, they increase the distance they can jump. While sprinting, you jump higher.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/mine: You spawn in an Abandoned Mineshaft.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/pois: Your body does not react to poison as it is immune to it.
You release venom at the touch. Injecting poison to others when you hit them.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/silk: [Load Toolbar Activator] You trap every player and mob in a 10 block radius in a cobweb.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/spid: You naturally take slightly less damage.
Spiders and Cave Spiders are all your allies and will not attack you.
Your anatomy allows you to be stronger.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/summ: You can summon friendly cave spiders.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/web_: Launch a web in the direction you're facing. Deals damage if it lands on the same block as an entity.
power.origins-plus-plus.calamitous-rogue: Killing withers, ender dragons, illagers, and iron golems gives you bonus emeralds. However, other entities have a 20% chance to not drop anything.
Big Game Hunter
The villagers put a bounty on you, so they won't trade with you unless you use Smooth Talk on them.
Bounty Target
As an assassin, you suffer from reduced damage if your stealth bar isn't full.
Bad DPS
Place a marker at your feet. If you get a kill on anything while sneaking, teleport back instantly.
Secrets of the Trade
You have a 33% chance to instantly restore 1 durability of your weapon when hitting something (unless the weapon is 1 hit away from breaking).
Weapon Expert
Iron golems will attack you the moment you break crops near them.
Infamous
[Shift + Right-Click] a villager to raise your reputation with them, letting you trade even despite Bounty Target. If a villager is nearby after 10 seconds, iron golems will begin hunting you.
Smooth Talker
When not attacking or taking damage, you slowly fade into shadows, eventually becoming invisible.
Stealth

Strikes while stealthed reset your bar, but gain an extra effect based on your held item:
- Axes shatter shields, dealing heavy damage to the item.
- Shields stun the victim for a short time and breaks their flight (if any).
- Swords strip any health-increasing status effects from the target.
- Tridents (melee only) deal drowning damage after a short delay.
Ambush
Ambush strikes make your victim glow for a medium duration for you.
Thrill of the Hunt
Your stealth bar refills instantly after scoring a kill.
Without a Trace
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cake: You are able to craft a cake with 9 sugar in a crafting table
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cook: You are able to craft a cookie with 4 sugars in a crafting table
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/favo: Eating cookies gives you more saturation than normal
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/hard: Temporarily get resistance, but lose some food points
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/suga: You don't take damage from sweet berry bushes.
You start with some sugar related items
Craft 9 sugar with 9 sweet berries in a crafting table
When you have sugar in your offhand, you eat it and get sugar effects
power.origins-plus-plus.child-of-cthulhu: You change the color of your skin if you are in water or on land.
Fire represents everything you are against for, so it deals 3x damage to you.
You can launch yourself in the air, in the direction you are looking at.
You can switch between Small, Normal and Large size.
Since you have grown use to water, you get slowness on land (when it is not raining).
You are granted with permanent Water Breathing.
You are made to hunt monsters on foreign worlds, thus you do not need oxygen.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/chimeri: You are heavily mutated and made for a high risk combat, you won't use shields as they slow you down. Fire is something you need to deal with as you are critically weak to it
Let loose your bioweapon to rot away whatever caught your ire.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/pathoph: You are made to directly absorb material to repair yourself. Hurting something will restore hunger. However, you can't eat normal food as you are a synthetic creature
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/phase_s: You teleport after taking damage. (Up to once per minute)
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/schrodi: Your HP is cut in half under the sun, as it is uncertain your biology is living or dead.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/unstabl: Made to adapt you take in potion effects one level stronger, however, this also applies to negative ones as you seem to be defective
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/xenite_: Eldritch metal cancels out any G-Forces on your body, making you immune to fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cobras_tou: To defend yourself, you poison people you attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cold_resou: You don't like cold. Staying on a cold place will start to lower your temperature. A bar of cold will start to increase. Having some cold will apply you slowness plus slightly blue skin. Reaching Max cold will increase the slowness level and blue tone, and you will start to get damage. Cold will naturally decrease after leaving the cold place.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/green_skin: Your skin has turned green from the mass of scales covering your body.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/poison_sho: Shoots a Poison Arrow wherever you are looking at.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/scale_armo: Your scales provide natural protection, giving you 1 bar of armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/strength_i: You are naturally stronger because of the heat, you gain strength during the day and in the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/def: You have a small permanent armor boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/no_: You cannot eat regular food. Instead, you can consume copper by placing it in your offhand. Raw copper gives two points, copper ingot gives 3, and a copper block gives 10.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/oxi: You oxidize over time in three stages. The more oxidized you are, the slower and weaker you will become. Place honeycomb in your offhand, and it will be consumed to undo oxidation.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/sma: You are naturally half a block tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/str: You have a small permanent damage boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.corrupted-wither: Even thought you are a skeleton you still somehow need food and need it often...
You warp to another dimension becoming invulnerable to any kind of damage and become invisible, when enter/exiting the dimension you emit a sound.
You can cause any nearby projectiles to warp and slow down allowing you to dodge them with ease.
You are a wither skeleton and thus deal an extra heart of damage with any type of sword.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/axe.de: Learning from your family, you learned how to use axes more proficiently than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/crafti: Due to your specialization in crafting you don't require a crafting table to craft, being able to summon a crafting GUI.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/fire.d: Spending your time on the forge you became immune to heat and fire. You still take damage in lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/pillag: You take more damage from your natural enemy, the Pillagers.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/undead: However much you train, you aren't able to get over your fear of the undead.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/villag: You lived a sheltered life, as such you didn't leave the village growing up. You spawn in a village.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/disloc: You can teleport anywhere within a 25 block range.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/mage_b: [Primary] + [Shift] You can turn a book in your offhand into a Mage Spell Book.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/recove: [Secondary + Shift] Use mana to heal yourself.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/resour: You have a mana bar which can be used to cast spells. If you run out of mana, you die.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/carry: [Shift + Left-Click] a minion to turn it into a Petrified Heart again.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/comma: Single out a mob for all of your minions to target.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/disco: Your blood sacrifices reduced your max health. Summoning minions reduces it even further, if you stay near them.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/equip: Your minions will automatically pick up items on the ground to use as gear.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/freez: [Shift + Right-Click] a minion to make it wait for you patiently, freezing it in place. Do it again to unfreeze a minion.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/join_: Mobs you summon won't attempt to attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/night: Your SOUL bar regenerates slowly at night.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_me: You barely deal any damage with swords and axes.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_tr: Villagers refuse to trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/petri: Most hostile mobs you kill drop petrified hearts, containing their vital data. SOUL is needed to summon bound mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/small: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can fire a ray of dark energy at will to deal light magic damage. The damage increases as your expertise in necromancy increases.
Like all occultists, you use SOUL energy for your demonic rituals. Accumulate it by killing mobs.
